comments.creator: me@michaelkohler.info
comments.raw_text:
I just received the "Thank you" email after joining Mozilla. It says:

"We’re so glad you've joined us.  If you want to learn even more about Mozilla, or brag to your friends about your generous support for the Web, you can check out, and share, this video: http://www.mozilla.org/join/thankyou.html"

Unfortunately, this URL doesn't exist and therefore leads to a 404.
comments.author: me@michaelkohler.info
comments.text:
I just received the "Thank you" email after joining Mozilla. It says:

"We’re so glad you've joined us.  If you want to learn even more about Mozilla, or brag to your friends about your generous support for the Web, you can check out, and share, this video: http://www.mozilla.org/join/thankyou.html"

Unfortunately, this URL doesn't exist and therefore leads to a 404.

comments.author: hi@kesavan.info
comments.text:
Okay! Let me fix this.
Any one have any link/video supposed to be anchored?

I'm going to anchor that link to http://www.mozilla.org/en-US/contribute/ ...

Any clue?

:michaelkohler -- what form (url) did you use to sign up for and 'Join Mozilla?' We want to make sure we're verifying the correct path.

comments.text: :michaelkohler -- what form (url) did you use to sign up for and 'Join Mozilla?' We want to make sure we're verifying the correct path.

comments.raw_text: Unfortunatelyy, I don't remember, but the subject of the said mail is "Thank you, you’re now an official Mozilla supporter‏". I hope this helps. Don't you have a Repository where you can search for a string and see in which templates this link is used and which links use that template?
comments.text: Unfortunatelyy, I don't remember, but the subject of the said mail is "Thank you, you’re now an official Mozilla supporter‏". I hope this helps. wbowden@mozilla.com
comments.text: Hi Anthony.  Adding Ben Simon.  This is a different app that the foundation uses for their email program and donation processing.  No correlation to Exact Target.
comments.author: wbowden@mozilla.com

comments.text: Strange -- I'm not actually sure what's supposed to be on that page. Adding Watershed & Ryan. If they aren't sure, I think I'll change that email to point to /about. Possible to redirect the /join/thankyou url there, for anyone with the old autoresponder?
